definition: Yeonpyeong island on Yellow Sea coast of Korea
a plain/ping, unit of area equal to approx. 3.3058 square meters (used in Japan and Taiwan)

sentences.english: Over the years, North Korea has made many attacks near the island.
sentences.chinese: 多年以來，北韓多次向延坪島附近發動襲擊。

sentences.english: North Korea must first day the ship sank and taeyonpyong shelling incident.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮首先要對天安艦沉沒和延坪島炮擊事件負責。

sentences.english: Outside the Yeonpyeong elementary school, crews are building small shelters.
sentences.chinese: 在延坪島小學，人們正在搭建臨時小房。

sentences.english: But Kim does not know when people will start coming back to Yeonpyeong.
sentences.chinese: 但是金三列不知道人們會在什麼時候開始返回延坪島。

sentences.english: Park is from a smaller nearby island that was also shelled.
sentences.chinese: 樸明財住在延坪島附近一個小島，這次也遭受了炮擊。

sentences.english: The North's artillery barrage Tuesday destroyed civilian homes as well as military bases on Yeonpyeong Island.
sentences.chinese: 北韓炮火星期二歲會了延坪島的民宅和軍事基地。

sentences.english: On Friday, the North conducted an apparent artillery drill within sight of Yeonpyeong island.
sentences.chinese: 星期五，北韓在延坪島進行了一次明顯的炮擊演習。

sentences.english: Jun Han plans early next week in island waters of the sea floor extension fire training.
sentences.chinese: 韓軍計劃於下週初期在延坪島海域進行海上射擊訓練。

sentences.english: Some South Koreans criticized the government for leaving Yeonpyeong inadequately protected.
sentences.chinese: 部分南韓人批評政府沒有善盡保衛延坪島的職責。
